almost.functional.utils
Class SupplierIterable<T>

java.lang.Object
  almost.functional.utils.SupplierIterable<T>
Type Parameters:
T - type of the Iterable and the Suppliers Optional
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<T>
public class SupplierIterable<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<T>

Creates an immutable Iterable from any Supplier of Optionals. The resulting Iterator hasNext until the Supplier returns an empty Optional.

Constructor Summary

          Constructor accepting the Supplier.
